title: Daylight
author: David Kushner
lyrics:
[00:17.66] Telling myself, "I won't go there"
[00:21.33] Oh, but I know that I won't care
[00:25.23] Tryna wash away all the blood I've spilled
[00:32.34] This lust is a burden that we both share
[00:36.07] Two sinners can't atone from a lone prayer
[00:39.65] Souls tied, intertwined by our pride and guilt
[00:46.39] (Ooh) there's darkness in the distance
[00:51.48] From the way that I've been livin'
[00:55.23] (Ooh) but I know I can't resist it
[01:01.46] Oh, I love it and I hate it at the same time
[01:05.31] You and I drink the poison from the same vine
[01:09.17] Oh, I love it and I hate it at the same time
[01:12.68] Hidin' all of our sins from the daylight
[01:16.22] From the daylight, runnin' from the daylight
[01:19.97] From the daylight, runnin' from the daylight
[01:23.70] Oh, I love it and I hate it at the same time
[01:31.75] Tellin' myself it's the last time
[01:35.14] Can you spare any mercy that you might find
[01:39.15] If I'm down on my knees again?
[01:44.05] 
[01:46.17] Deep down, way down, Lord, I try
[01:49.77] Try to follow your light, but it's nighttime
[01:53.34] Please don't leave me in the end
[02:00.47] (Ooh) there's darkness in the distance
[02:05.27] I'm begging for forgiveness
[02:09.18] (Ooh) but I know I might resist it, oh
[02:15.43] Oh, I love it and I hate it at the same time
[02:19.14] You and I drink the poison from the same vine
[02:22.78] Oh, I love it and I hate it at the same time
[02:26.56] Hidin' all of our sins from the daylight
[02:30.22] From the daylight, runnin' from the daylight
[02:34.07] From the daylight, runnin' from the daylight
[02:37.62] Oh, I love it and I hate it at the same time
[02:45.06] Oh, I love it and I hate it at the same time
[02:48.80] You and I drink the poison from the same vine
[02:52.37] Oh, I love it and I hate it at the same time
[02:56.23] Hidin' all of our sins from the daylight
[02:59.66] From the daylight, runnin' from the daylight
[03:03.26] From the daylight, runnin' from the daylight
[03:07.01] Oh, I love it and I hate it at the same time
[03:10.97]
